message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this valuable product. I believe it would be a great asset to you. Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget.  While $10,000 is a bit too low, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $10,750?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $10,500.
